#summary Environment to develop AInspector

= Introduction =

Set up Firebug Accessibility Inspector and making xpi

= Details =

  * Install Firefox/3.6.13 or higher (to have the eventlistenerservice available)
  * Install Firebug tracing-enabled version (1.6.X.0a3) http://getfirebug.com/releases/
  * Install Extension developer Addon  http://ted.mielczarek.org/code/mozilla/extensiondev/ to be able to build the xpi for deployment you must have winzip.exe on your machine using FireFox's Tools/Extension Developer/ Extension Builder.
       # Be sure install.rdf and content\scripts\about.js both contain the same version number, the version number must also be different (grater than the last version number posted).
       # *Note:* if installing winzip14.0/winzip15.0, make sure to install command line winzip.
